=== About me ===
Marco Diaz (ZethaByte) is a GNU/Linux sysadmin and user. Free Software Enthusiast and Lover Technology.
I'm a systems engineering, I've been a Linux User since 2002 with Mandrake Linux .

=== Contributions ===

* I've done several migrations from Windows to Ubuntu Linux ( in desktop and servers) for different companies over 100 employees ( In Colombia ) , now these companies continue to use linux.
* Bug reporting for Ubuntu.
* Translation for Ubuntu.
